thread.title: Thirty-five staff at famous pub 'got text at 3am saying their jobs were gone'
thread.title_full: Thirty-five staff at famous pub 'got text at 3am saying their jobs were gone'

title: Thirty-five staff at famous pub 'got text at 3am saying their jobs were gone'
text: Thirty-five staff at famous pub 'got text at 3am saying their jobs were gone' Independent.ie STAFF at one of Ireland’s oldest and best-known pub-restaurants thought a 3am text telling them it was ceasing operations with immediate effect was “only a wind-up”. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/thirtyfive-staff-at-famous-pub-got-text-at-3am-saying-their-jobs-were-gone-35449767.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35261506.ece/cc254/AUTOCROP/h342/pub%20pint%20app.JPG Stock image STAFF at one of Ireland’s oldest and best-known pub-restaurants thought a 3am text telling them it was ceasing operations with immediate effect was “only a wind-up”. Share Thirty-five staff at famous pub 'got text at 3am saying their jobs were gone' Independent.ie STAFF at one of Ireland’s oldest and best-known pub-restaurants thought a 3am text telling them it was ceasing operations with immediate effect was “only a wind-up”. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/thirtyfive-staff-at-famous-pub-got-text-at-3am-saying-their-jobs-were-gone-35449767.html
